mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Course (classNumber, departmentId, grade, year, semester, maxPersonnel, startTimeId, endTimeId, classroom) VALUES (#{classNumber},#{departmentId}, #{grade},#{year},#{semester},#{maxPersonnel},#{startTimeId},#{endTimeId},#{classroom})
mapper.select: SELECT classCode, classNumber, departmentId, grade, year, semester, maxPersonnel, startTimeId, endTimeId, classroom FROM Course ORDER BY classCode DESC LIMIT 0,1

SELECT c.grade, i.courseClassification, c.classCode, c.classNumber, i.courseName, i.credit, i.theory, i.practice, c.maxPersonnel, d.name, c.year, c.semester, (SELECT t.time FROM CourseTime t WHERE t.id = c.startTimeId) startTime, (SELECT t.time FROM CourseTime t WHERE t.id = c.endTimeId) endTime, classroom FROM Course c LEFT JOIN Department d ON c.departmentId = d.id LEFT JOIN CourseInfo i ON c.classNumber = i.classNumber
